    • Method Detail

      • create

        PointPermit create​(PointPermit pointPermit,
                   int empId,
                   int pointActionId)
        Creates and saves a given point permit in the data base with inserted employee and point action.
        Parameters:
        pointPermit - the point permit to create.
        empId - the employee's id to insert.
        pointActionId - point action's id to insert.
        Returns:
        the created object.

      • update

        void update​(PointPermit pointPermit,
            int empId,
            int pointActionId)
     throws NotFoundException
        Updates an existing in the data base point permit with inserted employee and point action.
        Parameters:
        pointPermit - the point permit to update.
        empId - the employee's id to insert.
        pointActionId - point action's id to insert.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if there aren't updated object in the data base.
